title: Sync email stops sometimes
creator: rvschalkwijk
content:
Hi guys, thanks in advance for your help on a great product. I have been using Thunderbird forever and want to continue to do so!

On my Android Phone (Pixel 7a) with Android 15 I am experiencing a breakdown of the sync of my inbox of my gmail. This is one of two email adresses I am using (hotmail is the other) and the Gmail-Inbox and the gmail-spam box are the only two synced folders.

This can work for days or even weeks, but then suddenly is stops syncing. I do not notice this until looking at my inbox from another device. I then have to sync manually to get the sync going again. Changing between WiFi ang 4G/5G does not make the sync startup again.

I have set the batterysaving-settings off for T-bird and not changing any other settings which might affect this behaviour.

Can you help please? Regards, Ramon

title: Outlook error message
creator: rwac
content: Hello, when I try to login to my outlook.cz mail account, I get error screen that says: Server error The server returned the following message: User is authenticated but not connected. I searched online and I found, that I wasn't the only one getting this error. Everyone solved it by disabling ipv6 in thunderbird. I don't know how to do that on phone (I found how to disable it on pc). I have another outlook.cz account that I am logged into and it works fine (I logged in 2 weeks ago). Is it thunderbird problem or should I contact microsoft. Thank you in advance for your answers.
